Message:
If I were to have
become a witch sooner,
I could have protected her...
No, it’s too late for excuses.

That’s why, I’m going to go
save her now.

I...probably won’t ever
return to this village.
After all, if Priscilla and I stay here,

we’ll just be tools to keep
the witch’s bloodline alive.

I’ll keep the promise
I made to you.

And I will never,
ever give up until
we’re together again!
